sponsor: The University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio
briefTitle: SGLT2 Inhibition and Stimulation of Endogenous Glucose Production: Protocol 2
officialTitle: Protocol 2: Elucidation of Mechanisms Responsible for the Increase in EGP Following SGLT2 Inhibition: Decrease in Plasma Glucose Conc or Change in Islet Hormone (Glucagon/Insulin) Secretion
summary: In Protocol 2, the investigators will determine the role of pancreatic hormones (increase in plasma glucagon and decrease in plasma insulin concentration) in the stimulation of EGP following SGLT2 inhibition.
